import React from "react"; import Button from "../../../../../components/Button"; import checkIcon from "../../../../../public/assets/icons/Check.png"; const pricingItems = [ { people: "individual", name: "Starter", description: "Experience Kode!'s core features for free.", price: "Free", priceDesc: "Suited for Beginners and Explorers.", cta: "Get started for free", features: [ "Access to a limited number of competitions per month", "Basic AI assistance for hints and guidance (limited to 5 uses/month)", "Built-in IDE with syntax highlighting", "Real-time leaderboards for competition tracking", ], }, ]; const PricingItem = ({ item }) => { return (
{item.people}

{item.name}

{item.description}

{item.price}

{item.priceDesc}

Access to a limited number of competitions per month

Access to a limited number of competitions per month

Access to a limited number of competitions per month

Access to a limited number of competitions per month

); }; export default PricingItem;
